summary: The diff implements the super admin configuration feature with backend storage, authentication checks, frontend AdminGuard updates, and comprehensive logging throughout. All four requirements (REQ-47, REQ-48, REQ-49, REQ-50) appear to be implemented with evidence in the modified files.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) added to handle state migration with new superAdmin field
hallucinated_features.reason: Migration infrastructure was not requested in BuildRequest. The requirement only specified storing super admin principal in stable storage, not creating a separate migration module.

hallucinated_features.description: getSuperAdmin() query method that allows admins to view the super admin principal
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request a method to retrieve or view the super admin principal. Only setting/updating was specified in REQ-48.

hallucinated_features.description: hasAdminAccess() helper function that checks both super admin and regular admin status
hallucinated_features.reason: While REQ-47 mentions role-based access control, the BuildRequest did not request creating or modifying functions to check regular admin status alongside super admin. The focus was on super admin configuration only.

hallucinated_features.description: Extensive Layout.tsx modifications with authentication state logging and QueryClient cache clearing
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-50 requested logging for super admin configuration process specifically. The Layout component logging appears to track general authentication state changes, not specifically super admin setup.
